changelog_summary: ## v0.5.3 (2026-02-23) Added: - New hosted update entrypoint: `https://ordersys.stonewallmedia.co.uk/update.sh`. - Expanded local operator CLI commands for start/stop, version visibility, and backup inventory/retention. - Full-system backup and restore commands for DB, config, and runtime volume data. Fixed: - Admin release changelog view now prefers live delivery changelog content instead of a bundled placeholder summary. - LAN HTTP login lockout scenario caused by refresh-cookie mode mismatch in some production compose environments. - Installer/update operator messaging and terminal completion guidance.
